meta.notes: Extended schema linking visual decisions to Pillar 2 (hooks/psychology) and Pillar 3 (dialogue/logic), usable by human crew and AI visual systems.

color_grading.palette: Desaturated Cool Tones (Biru/Abu-abu) dengan aksen Merah (Notifikasi/Bahaya).
color_grading.mood: Claustrophobic but cozy (Kamar sempit yang penuh barang).

character_sarah: Kaos oversized (band/polos) - Simbol kenyamanan di tengah stres.
Rambut dicepol asal (Messy bun) - Simbol 'tidak punya waktu urus diri'.

mandatory_props: Gelas kopi yang sudah habis (Latte Factor symbol)
Laptop dengan sticker menutupi logo (Rebel vibe)

sarah_room_default.description: Kamar kost sempit, sedikit berantakan, cahaya natural soft, vibe lelah tapi masih berfungsi.

truth_terminal_glitch.description: Close-up wajah Sarah dengan efek glitch, overlay teks internal monologue dan nuansa terminal komputer.

visual_beats_sequence.ai_visual_prompt_core: raw cinematic realism, desaturated cool tones with red notification accents, close-up of a tired Indonesian Gen Z woman in a messy kost bedroom, oversized t-shirt, messy bun, glasses, surrounded by shopping receipts and paylater notifications on screen, subtle glitch effect as if the system is breaking, no studio lighting, no luxury items
visual_beats_sequence.for_human_direction_notes: Shot pembuka: close-up Sarah di kamar kost sempit. Layar HP/laptop spam notifikasi diskon. Gunakan efek glitch ringan saat dia menatap notifikasi, seolah ada 'Truth Terminal' yang mulai mengintervensi pikirannya.

visual_beats_sequence.ai_visual_prompt_core: POV of bank app screen on a phone showing an almost empty balance, 'Rp 48.500', handheld shaky shot, subtle reflection of a worried face in the screen, messy kost room background out of focus, no branding, no flexing, just quiet panic
visual_beats_sequence.for_human_direction_notes: Insert atau potongan B-roll: layar HP dengan saldo ATM kecil (Rp 48.500). Kamera agak goyang (handheld) untuk rasa cemas. Bisa tambahkan pantulan wajah Sarah di layar jika memungkinkan.

visual_beats_sequence.ai_visual_prompt_core: same messy kost room but slightly better organized desk, Sarah calmly closing a shopping app notification and opening a simple budgeting note on her laptop, warm but still muted lighting, no obvious product placement, subtle sense of relief not full happiness
visual_beats_sequence.for_human_direction_notes: Beat akhir: kamar masih kecil dan berantakan, tapi ada satu tindakan kecil positif (Sarah menutup notifikasi belanja dan membuka catatan budgeting). Ekspresi: lega tipis, bukan tiba-tiba happy sukses.

editing_style_guide.pacing_global: Fast & Chaotic di awal (mewakili anxiety), Slow & Clear di akhir (saat solusi ditemukan).

visual_effects_truth_terminal_style.glitch_effect: Gunakan efek 'Glitch' saat Sarah menyadari kebenaran (Gnosis).
visual_effects_truth_terminal_style.overlay_text_style: Teks muncul cepat seperti pikiran intrusif (Internal Monologue).

screen_insert_assets: Mockup Notifikasi: 'Diskon 90% Berakhir 5 Menit Lagi!' (The Enemy)

timing_schema_seconds.4_5: first glitch + internal monologue text flash

text_overlay_templates: INI BUKAN SELF REWARD, INI PERANGKAP.
GAK HARUS KAYA BUAT NGERASA CUKUP.

rejection_criteria_hard: Terlihat terlalu 'Clean/Aesthetic' ala Influencer (Must look like struggle).
Produk muncul di 3 detik pertama (Hard Selling violation).
matt_orlic_structure_check: Apakah video dimulai dengan MASALAH (The World)?
Apakah SOLUSI (FrugalFin) baru muncul di akhir?
brand_safety_check: Tidak ada logo kompetitor yang terlihat jelas.
forbidden_mismatch_examples: Visual flexing barang mewah ketika hook membahas saldo ATM yang hampir nol.
Ekspresi terlalu bahagia ketika dialog membahas anxiety finansial.
Pacing super pelan di beat pembuka yang seharusnya chaotic/anxious.

ai_generation_interface.default_image_model_prompt_style: raw cinematic realism, desaturated cool tones, small messy kost room, Indonesian Gen Z woman, oversized t-shirt, messy bun, working at cluttered desk with coffee cup, receipts, instant noodles, soft natural light, no studio light, no visible brand logos

prompt_snippets_by_hook_type.The Enemy Call-Out: notifications from shopping apps and paylater services filling the phone screen, red warning icons, oppressive feeling of digital consumerism closing in
prompt_snippets_by_hook_type.The Relatable Failure: close up of almost empty bank account balance on a phone screen, messy room in the background, subtle reflection of a worried face
prompt_snippets_by_hook_type.The Conspiracy (Truth Terminal Flavor): darkened room with computer screen showing enlarged terms and conditions, interest rate numbers highlighted in red, glitchy text as if revealing a hidden truth
